item.title: [unf] Draconian Gate-Bot
item.description:
Artifact Creature — Robot

When Draconian Gate-Bot enters the battlefield, choose one —

• Open an Attraction. (Put the top card of your Attraction deck onto the battlefield.)

• Destroy target Attraction. (It's put into its owner's junkyard.)

item.title: [unf] Clown Car
item.description:
Artifact — Vehicle

When Clown Car enters the battlefield, roll X six-sided dice. For each odd result, create a 1/1 white Clown Robot artifact creature token. For each even result, put a +1/+1 on Clown Car.

Crew 2

item.title: [unf] Blue Ribbon
item.description:
Artifact — Equipment

When Blue Ribbon enters the battlefield, ask a person outside the game which creature you control is most deserving of a blue ribbon. Attach Blue Ribbon to that creature.

Equipped creature has best in show. (Whenever another creature becomes the target of a spell or ability you control, you may copy that spell or ability. If you do, the copy targets this creature.)

Equip {3}

item.title: [unf] Autograph Book
item.description:
Artifact

Autograph Book enters the battlefield with a page counter on it for each person who has signed it.

{3}, {T}, Remove a page counter from Autograph Book: Draw a card.

item.title: [unf] Urza's Fun House
item.description:
Land — Urza’s

{T}: Add {C}.

{T}: Add {∞}. Activate only once and only if you control an Urza's Mine, an Urza's Power-Plant, and an Urza's Tower.

{7}, {T}: Head to AskUrza.com and click Urza's Fun House.

item.title: [unf] Ticket Turbotubes
item.description:
Artifact

{T}: Add one mana of any color.

{3}, {T}: You get {TIX} (a ticket counter).

item.title: [unf] Ticketomaton
item.description:
Artifact Creature — Robot

When Ticketomaton enters the battlefield, you get {TIX}, then you may put a sticker on a nonland permanent you own.

item.title: [unf] Souvenir T-Shirt
item.description:
Artifact — Equipment

Gear Up, sponsored by Wizards of the Coast — As Souvenir T-Shirt enters the battlefield, roll two six-sided dice. For each Magic-branded item you're wearing, roll an additional six-sided die. Choose two of those results.

Equipped creature gets +X/+Y, where X is the first chosen result and Y is the second.

Equip {4}

item.title: [unf] Park Map
item.description:
Artifact

{1}, Sacrifice Park Map: Search your library for a land card that doesn't have the same art as a permanent you control, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.

item.title: [unf] Katerina of Myra's Marvels
item.description:
Legendary Creature — Human Performer

As Katerina of Myra's Marvels enters the battlefield, choose a letter.

Whenever you cast a spell whose name begins with the chosen letter, create a white 2/2 Cat creature token with flying.

Partner (You can have two commanders if they both have partner.)

item.title: [unf] Ignacio of Myra's Marvels
item.description:
Legendary Creature — Lizard Performer

As Ignacio of Myra's Marvels enters the battlefield, choose armor, blood, book, bottle, fang, fire, scroll, spear, sword, or water.

Whenever you cast a spell with the chosen object in its art, create two Treasure tokens.

Partner (You can have two commanders if both have partner.)

https://shopee.sg/Magic-The-Gathering-Unfinity-Draft-Booster-i.520514080.17885334102

item.title: [unf] Hardy of Myra's Marvels
item.description:
Legendary Creature — Elf Performer

As Hardy of Myra's Marvels enters the battlefield, choose a number.

Whenever you cast a spell with the chosen number of lines of flavor text, put that many +1/+1 counters on target creature.

Partner (You can have two commanders if both have partner.)

https://gizmodo.com/magic-the-gathering-unfinity-card-preview-interview-1849581930

item.title: [unf] "Brims" Barone, Midway Mobster
item.description:
Legendary Creature — Human Rogue

When "Brims" Barone, Midway Mobster enters the battlefield, put a +1/+1 counter on each other creature you control that has a hat.

"Brims" Barone, Midway Mobster has menace as long as you're wearing a hat.

https://www.facebook.com/MagicTheGathering.kr/photos/pb.532442256813565.-2207520000../5550642761660131/?type=3&theater

item.title: [unf] Ambassador Blorpityblorpboop
item.description:
Legendary Creature — Alien Advisor Guest

When Ambassador Blorpityblorpboop enters the battlefield, you get {TIX}{TIX}{TIX}, then you may put a sticker on a nonland permanent you own.

At the beginning of each combat, you may have Ambassador Blorpityblorpboop's base power and toughness become equal to the total power and toughness of all stickers on permanents you control.

https://magic.wizards.com/en/articles/archive/card-preview/sticky-unfinity-design-2022-09-21

item.title: [unf] It Came from Planet Glurg
item.description:
Legendary Creature — Alien Ooze

You may have It Came from Planet Glurg enter the battlefield as a copy of X different creatures on the battlefield. (It has their total power, total toughness, combined mana costs, all text boxes, names, art, and so on.)

https://gizmodo.com/magic-the-gathering-unfinity-card-preview-interview-1849581930

item.title: [unf] Claire D'Loon, Joy Sculptor
item.description:
Legendary Creature — Human Performer

When Clare D'Loon, Joy Sculptor enters the battlefield, for the rest of the game, tokens you own become cards that are still tokens. (They continue to exist after they leave the battlefield.)

{1}{W}{U}, {T}: You may put a token from your graveyard or hand onto the battlefield.

https://twitter.com/LelandPalmerMTG/status/1572948915888230402

item.title: [unf] Spinnerette, Arachnobat
item.description:
Legendary Creature — Spider Performer

Reach

When Spinnerette, Arachnobat enters the battlefield, open an Attraction.

As long as you control three or more Attractions, Spinnerette gets +2/+0 and has menace.

item.title: [unf] Pietra, Crafter of Clowns
item.description:
Legendary Creature — Human Clown Artificer

Haste

Robots you control get +1/+1.

{R}{W}, {T}, Tell a joke you haven't told this game to someone outside the game: Create a 1/1 white Clown Robot artifact creature token. If that person laughed, the token gains haste until end of turn.

item.title: [unf] Pietra, Crafter of Clowns
item.description:
Legendary Creature — Human Clown Artificer

Haste

Robots you control get +1/+1.

{R}{W}, {T}, Tell a joke you haven't told this game to someone outside the game: Create a 1/1 white Clown Robot artifact creature token. If that person laughed, the token gains haste until end of turn.

item.title: [unf] Nocturno of Myra's Marvels
item.description:
Legendary Creature — Vampire Performer

As Nocturno of Myra's Marvels enters the battlefield, choose a word with five or more letters.

Whenever you cast a spell with the chosen word in its rules text, you draw a card and you lose 2 life.

Partner (You can have two commanders if both have partner.)

item.title: [unf] Plate Spinning
item.description:
Enchantment

Whenever you cast a spell, copy it and you may choose new targets for the copy. Then balance a card from outside the game on one of your fingertips. When that card falls or touches another card, sacrifice Plate Spinning.

https://t.bilibili.com/710073877933326357

item.title: [unf] Park Re-Entry
item.description:
Sorcery

Return up to two target creature cards that each have a hat and/or mana value 3 or less from your graveyard to the battlefield.

https://shopee.sg/wizardsofthecoast

item.title: [unf] ______ ______ ______ Trespasser
item.description:
Creature — Human Rogue Guest

When this creature enters the battlefield, you may put a name sticker on it.

{3}{U}: This creature gets +1/+0 until end of turn for each name sticker on it. It can't be blocked this turn.

https://www.facebook.com/GoldenGoblinGames/photos/pcb.3202001300111222/3202001263444559/

item.title: [unf] Quick Fixer
item.description:
Creature — Azra Employee

Menace

Whenever Quick Fixer deals combat damage to a player, open an Attraction. (Put the top card of your Attraction deck onto the battlefield.)

https://www.facebook.com/photo?fbid=508211737979942&set=pcb.508211761313273

item.title: [unf] Form of the Approach of the Second Sun
item.description:
Enchantment

When this enchantment enters the battlefield, you gain 7 life. You become a card until you leave your library or that library is shuffled. Put yourself seventh from the top, balancing the cards on top of your head.

When you draw yourself, you win the game.

When one or more cards fall off your head, exile them and all cards on your head, then sacrifice this enchantment.

https://magic.wizards.com/en/articles/archive/making-magic/making-space-part-2-2022-09-26

item.title: [unf] Tunnel of Love
item.description:
Artifact — Attraction

Visit — Choose an opponent. They choose a creature you control, then you choose a creature you control. You may exile the chosen creatures. If you do, return them to the battlefield under their owner's control at the beginning of the next end step. Otherwise, the chosen creatures fight each other.

https://magic.wizards.com/en/articles/archive/card-image-gallery/unfinity

item.title: [unf] Tunnel of Love
item.description:
Artifact — Attraction

Visit — Choose an opponent. They choose a creature you control, then you choose a creature you control. You may exile the chosen creatures. If you do, return them to the battlefield under their owner's control at the beginning of the next end step. Otherwise, the chosen creatures fight each other.

item.title: [unf] Scavenger Hunt
item.description:
Artifact — Attraction

Visit — Choose "a weapon," "five or more creatures", or "words or numbers" at random. You have ten seconds to search your library and reveal a card with the chosen item in its art. If you do, claim the prize! Then shuffle.

Prize — You get {TIX}{TIX}, then you may put a sticker on a nonland permanent you own. Sacrifice Scavenger Hunt and open an Attraction.

item.title: [unf] Scavenger Hunt
item.description:
Artifact — Attraction

Visit — Choose "a vampire or zombie," "fire, lightning, or an explosion", or "a metallic creature" at random. You have ten seconds to search your library and reveal a card with the chosen item in its art. If you do, claim the prize! Then shuffle.

Prize — You get {TIX}{TIX}, then you may put a sticker on a nonland permanent you own. Sacrifice Scavenger Hunt and open an Attraction.

item.title: [unf] Scavenger Hunt
item.description:
Artifact — Attraction

Visit — Choose "an elf or goblin," "a tail", or "a flying creature or flying vehicle" at random. You have ten seconds to search your library and reveal a card with the chosen item in its art. If you do, claim the prize! Then shuffle.

Prize — You get {TIX}{TIX}, then you may put a sticker on a nonland permanent you own. Sacrifice Scavenger Hunt and open an Attraction.

item.title: [unf] Scavenger Hunt
item.description:
Artifact — Attraction

Visit — Choose "a four-legged creature," "a liquid other than water", or "a door" at random. You have ten seconds to search your library and reveal a card with the chosen item in its art. If you do, claim the prize! Then shuffle.

Prize — You get {TIX}{TIX}, then you may put a sticker on a nonland permanent you own. Sacrifice Scavenger Hunt and open an Attraction.

item.title: [unf] Scavenger Hunt
item.description:
Artifact — Attraction

Visit — Choose "a creature wearing a hat," "a book or scroll", or "teeth" at random. You have ten seconds to search your library and reveal a card with the chosen item in its art. If you do, claim the prize! Then shuffle.

Prize — You get {TIX}{TIX}, then you may put a sticker on a nonland permanent you own. Sacrifice Scavenger Hunt and open an Attraction.

item.title: [unf] Roxi, Publicist to the Stars
item.description:
Legendary Creature — Human Employee

Flying

Roxi, Publicist to the Stars power is equal to the number of permanents you control with an art sticker plus the number of cards in your graveyard with an art sticker.

When Roxi enters the battlefield, distribute up to two art stickers among one or two nonland permanents you own.

https://twitter.com/bajo/status/1573167337062400000
